Daily state of health

Source: R/pat_dailySoH.R
pat_dailySoH.Rd

This function combines the output of the State of Health (SoH) function arguments into a single tibble.

pat_dailySoH(pat = NULL, SoH_functions = c("PurpleAirSoH_dailyPctDC",
  "PurpleAirSoH_dailyPctReporting", "PurpleAirSoH_dailyPctValid",
  "PurpleAirSoH_dailyOtherFit", "PurpleAirSoH_dailyABFit"))

Arguments

pat

PurpleAir Timeseries pat object.
SoH_functions

Vector of function names. All the passed in functions must output tibbles with a daily `datetime` variable and must cover the same period of time.

Examples


SoH <-
  example_pat_failure_B %>%
  pat_dailySoH()
head(SoH)
#> # A tibble: 6 x 20
#>   datetime            pm25_A_pctDC pm25_B_pctDC pm25_A_pctRepor…

#> 2 2019-06-02 00:00:00            0            0             99.6
#> 3 2019-06-03 00:00:00            0            0             99.9
#> 4 2019-06-04 00:00:00            0            0             99.7
#> 5 2019-06-05 00:00:00            0            0             89.0
#> 6 2019-06-06 00:00:00            0            0             95.8
#> # … with 16 more variables: pm25_B_pctReporting <dbl>, pm25_A_pctValid <dbl>,
#> #   pm25_B_pctValid <dbl>, pm25_A_humidity_rsquared <dbl>,
#> #   pm25_A_temperature_rsquared <dbl>, pm25_B_humidity_rsquared <dbl>,

#> #   pm25_A_pm25_B_slope <dbl>, pm25_A_pm25_B_intercept <dbl>,
